title: Team Ranked 5's Season Reward
body:
**Dear Summoners,**

I am creating a team to urgently earn the end of season reward. Please add me and I'll throw you into immediate action!
IGN: bollockz

Cheers

replies.body:
IGN: MrScavenge
Rank: Gold 5
Role: Top/Mid
Main Champions: Irelia, Cho, Wukong, Fizz, Hecarim, Lux, Vlad
TeamSpeak, Skype, Curse : Yes
